contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Broadcast | call_letters = DXAG-TV | station_logo = [[Image:ABS-CBN logo.svg|200px]]| station_slogan = ''In The Service of The Filipino Worldwide''| station_branding = ''ABS-CBN TV-4 Iligan''| analog = 4 ([[VHF]])| digital = | other_chs = | affiliations = [[ABS-CBN]]| owner = [[ABS-CBN Corporation]]| founded = 1997| location = [[Iligan]]| callsign_meaning = '''DXAG'''| sister_stations = [[DXAM-TV]] 26 ([[Studio 23]])| effective_radiated_power = 1 kilowatt(8.41 kW ERP)<br>(DXAM-TV) 0.5 kilowatt(19.7 kW)| homepage = [http://www.abs-cbn.com www.abs-cbn.com]| }} '''DXAG-TV''' channel 4, is a commercial television station owned by [[ABS-CBN Corporation]]. It's studio is located at 6/F Elena Tower Inn, Andres Bonifacio Ave. (Tibanga Highway), Tibanga, [[Iligan City]]. ==ABS-CBN TV-4 Programs== *[[MAG TV|Mag TV Na, Ato Ni!]] (simulcast over TV-2 Cagayan de Oro & Bukidnon and TV-7 Ozamiz) *[[Pamahaw Espesyal]] (simulcast over TV-2 Cagayan de Oro & Bukidnon and TV-7 Ozamiz) *[[TV Patrol Northern Mindanao]] (simulcast over TV-2 Cagayan de Oro & Bukidnon and TV-7 Ozamiz) ==See also== *[[ABS-CBN Corporation]] *[[List of ABS-CBN Corporation channels and stations]] {{ABS-CBN Mindanao}} [[Category:ABS-CBN stations]] [[Category:Television channels and stations established in 1997]] [[Category:ABS-CBN Corporation]] {{Philippines-tv-stub}}
